title: DIH "Started" status says "less than a minute ago" when it's been much longer
description: Sometimes (exact circumstances not known) the "Started" output on the DIH status in the 4.1 UI will always say "less than a minute ago" even though the actual value is quite some time ago.

comments.author: Shawn Heisey
comments.content:
I am not running into this on my own system, but I have seen it in connection with an import on another issue - SOLR-4464.

One difference between that user's setup and mine is that they have multiple entities - one for every US state and DC.  I only have one.

comments.author: Shawn Heisey
comments.content:
If this looks like an isolated incident, then I will go ahead and close this issue.

This comment is part of an effort to close old issues that I have reported.  Search tag: elyograg2013springclean

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: hm, i'm not sure on this .. first thought would be a timezone issue - but i can't reproduce that one?

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: Nobody confirmed this and we have a new UI now. Can this one be closed?
